review: Great device that I love to usePrice: 5/5Ease of use: 4.5/5Content: 5/5Price is in the sweet spot for me to recommend you buying. The price is more than a Chromecast but with this you receive a remote. This is major selling point for me. When I'm watching TV i want a remote not my phone. So it is perfectly priced for the included items with a charger that has a very long cord and a hdmi adapter in-case your faces out the back and you don't have room.Price: 5/5The included remote is simple to use and great for navigation. Device is a little sluggish compared the the Fire TV box but it works well and its priced well for it performance.Ease of use: 4.5/5The content is wonderful. you have HULU, NETFLIX, AMAZON PRIME, PANDORA, ESPN, and the list goes on and on. Honestly it was great out of the box with lots of support.Content: 5/5
author: Benjamin L

review: I used to have a Chromecast before giving it away.  I recently got the Fire TV Stick as a replacement and could not be happier.  I use it mainly for my Amazon Music (awesome in and of itself,) Prime Video, and YouTube.  I usually use the remote for browsing for something to watch, but if you are trying to type something in for a search, use your phone.  I use my phone when watching youtube videos, and love how easy it is to search and play videos.  I would absolutely recommend this to anyone wanting a "smart TV" without buying a new TV.
